name: People are Stupid (So Hide Their Comments)
description:
Does what it says (to most sites), for the reason it says.  :-P

tags: hide, comment, comments, reply, replies, talkback

@-moz-document regexp("[^/]*//(?!(www.)?reddit.com)reddit.com.*") {
/*
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
*/
}

@-moz-document regexp("[^/]*//(?!(www.)?reddit.com)reddit.com.*") {
li a.comments, 
li a.comments.click,
li a.click,
a.comments, 
a.comments.click,
a.click
  {
    display: inline !important;
  }
}

@-moz-document domain("nytimes.com") {
#readerReviews
{ 
    display: none !important; 
}
}

@-moz-document domain("hci-matters.com") {
table.comments 
{
    display: table !important;
}

#the-comment-list .row-actions
{
    visibility: visible !important;
}

}
